channel.title: Casual wear – HaakenWP
channel.description: Một trang web mới sử dụng WordPress

item.title: NYKE RENEW SERENITY RUN
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on the joy in every mile.
item.content:encoded:
FIND YOUR PEACE IN LIGHTWEIGHT, CUSHIONED COMFORT.

Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on
the joy in every mile.

Your Mantra

An inner tag reads “Leave the negative, keep the positive, multiply your potential” to give you inspiration at every step.

Obsessed With Comfort

Ultra-soft cushioning feels responsive to give you a great feel from heel to toe.Nike Renew foam and a plush insole combine for lasting comfort.That feeling extends to the plush, wide opening around your heel and ankle that feels so
good you simply forget about it.

Supportive Fit

A strap wraps under your arch to give you that supportive comfort you expect.It tightens up when you pull the laces so you control the fit.

More Benefits
  • A rubber sole provides durable traction.
  • Mesh throughout the upper feels cool and breathable.
  • Colour Shown: White/Magic Ember/Light Soft Pink/Black
  • Style: DB0522-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE ASUNA
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Bridging sport and fashion, the Nyke Asuna Slide lets you transition effortlessly between worlds with its versatile style and comfort.Soft foam underfoot feels good all day, while the rugged tread pattern grips the sand, streets and trails you explore.The cinch cord offers a quick, customised fit for the terrain ahead.
item.content:encoded:
RELAX, EXPLORE, RECHARGE.REPEAT.

Bridging sport and fashion, the Nike Asuna Slide lets you transition effortlessly between worlds with its versatile style and comfort.Soft foam underfoot feels good all day, while the rugged tread pattern grips the sand, streets and
trails you explore.The cinch cord offers a quick, customised fit for the terrain ahead.

Benefits
  • A 2-part upper features a soft mesh booty and plush foam panel for a cushioned stride.Easily adjust your fit with the quick lacing system.
  • Dual-density foam feels soft and comfortable.
  • The core carrier midsole design helps keep your foot in place, while the rugged tread pattern adds traction for a variety of surfaces.
  • Colour Shown: Black/White/Anthracite
  • Style: CI8799-003
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM PEGASUS 38 LIMITED EDITION
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nyke Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.
item.content:encoded:
RESPONSIVE TRAINING WITH THE RIGHT FIT AND FEEL.

Your workhorse with wings returns.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that
nods back to the classic Peg.This special edition features multiple colours coming together to celebrate the Pegasus legacy.

A Colourful Celebration

This exclusive version of the Pegasus 38 features a mix of colourways on one shoe.It celebrates the diverse spectrum and history of the Pegasus.

Something Old, Something New

A wider forefoot means more space for your toes, while the shoe’s fit maintains the comfortable feel you expect from the Pegasus.Mesh in the upper provides a breathable and plush sensation that stretches with your foot for optimal
shape and fit.

Spring With Your Step

Nike React foam is lightweight, springy and durable.More foam means better cushioning without extra bulk.We tuned the forefoot Zoom Air unit to feel softer and give you more bounce with every step.It’s closer to your foot for a
responsive sensation.

Secure Fit

Midfoot webbing tightens around your foot when you lace up, letting you choose your fit and feel.

More Benefits
  • Foam tongue helps reduce lace pressure on the top of your foot.
  • Colour Shown: Dark Smoke Grey/White/Flash Crimson/Volt
  • Style: DJ3129-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: China

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE ACG AIR DESCHÜTZ +
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: From city hikes to canyon trails to long walks on the beach, the Nyke ACG Air Deschütz + is built to feel comfortable. Featuring a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, its plush padding around the ankle, heavy-duty webbing strap and easily adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.
item.content:encoded:
ENERGY FOR EVERYDAY JOURNEYS.

From city hikes to canyon trails to long walks on the beach, the Nike ACG Air Deschütz + is built to feel comfortable. Featuring a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, its plush padding around the ankle, heavy-duty
webbing strap and easily adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.

Benefits
  • The Air unit in the heel adds lasting comfort.
  • The webbing straps with hook-and-loop closure offer easy on-the-go adjustment and personalised comfort.
  • Plush padding around the ankle adds to the comfort, so you can focus on the journey.
  • The drop-in footbed helps keep your foot in place.
Product Details
  • Perforations on toe strap for extra ventilation
  • ACG logo on side
  • OG “AIR Deschütz” on sole
  • Colour Shown: Black/Iron Grey
  • Style: DC9093-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

item.title: NYKE ACG AIR DESCHUTZ +
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nyke ACG Air Deschutz + is built to feel comfortable.It’s got a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, with plush padding around the ankle for support.A heavy-duty webbing strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.
item.content:encoded:
A SANDAL THAT GOES WHERE YOU GO.

From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nike ACG Air Deschutz + is built to feel comfortable.It’s got a classic ’90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, with plush padding around the ankle for
support.A heavy-duty webbing strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.

Northwest Tested

This product was designed and tested in Oregon, USA.The state’s vast wilderness and climate served as inspiration for the sandal’s look and purpose.

Traction to Take You Places

The sticky rubber outsole delivers traction made for the outdoors.

Built for the Journey

Quick-drying materials in the upper help shed water to keep you comfortable.

More Benefits
  • An Air unit in the heel adds lasting comfort.
  • The webbing strap with hook-and-loop closure offers easy, on-the-go adjustment.
  • Plush padding around the ankle adds to the comfort so you can focus on your adventure.
  • A drop-in footbed helps keep your foot in place.
Product Details
  • ACG branding
  • Colour Shown: Moon Fossil/Black
  • Style: DC9092-001
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam
Nyke ACG

Ready to conquer or escape the city landscape, Nike All Conditions Gear outfits you in modern wear that tackles the elements.Windproof and waterproof fabrics and breathable technologies keep you covered, while next-level design
equips you with versatile storage and style options.

item.title: LEBRON WITNESS 4 EP
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Be a force on the court in the LeBron Witness 4: a great fit for powerful players who want good ankle support from a shoe that still feels light. Durably built for playing on outdoor courts, its sculpted, padded collar and exterior heel counter provide a stable fit, while visible cushioning units under the forefoot return energy with every step.
item.content:encoded:
LIGHT, STRONG AND RESPONSIVE FOR OUTDOOR BALL.

Be a force on the court in the LeBron Witness 4: a great fit for powerful players who want good ankle support from a shoe that still feels light. Durably built for playing on outdoor courts, its sculpted, padded collar and exterior
heel counter provide a stable fit, while visible cushioning units under the forefoot return energy with every step.

Responsive Feel

Zoom Air units under the forefoot compress under your weight then spring back, providing a responsive, propulsive feel. The cushioning is visible from the sides, giving you insight into the technology.

Stability and Support

High, shaped collar helps contain your ankle, while the rigid external heel counter helps keep you stable over the footbed.

Durable Outsole, Flexible Traction

The extra-durable outsole rubber is designed to be flexible. A shockwave-inspired traction pattern helps create quick cuts and transitions during possession.

More Benefits
  • Partial bootie with tongue construction for a supportive fit.
  • Resilient foam midsole for cushioning.
  • Padded collar for comfort.
Product Details
  • Moulded lion detail on the heel
  • Dual pull tabs
  • Colour Shown: Black/Hyper Cobalt/Clear
  • Style: CD0188-007
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam
